title: I scored bad in 2 of my board papers can I get 90+? - Quora

response.answer_text: If two of your previous examinations of mathematics and Science are not at par according to your supposition . Although in my opinion your thinking is not in proper direction , since without evaluation how can you say your papers are not good . Let us assume if possible that your examinations are not good then prepare nicely and concentrate on remaining examinations in following way :- Read NCERT carefully along with grammar portion in papers of Hindi English etc.In Hindi you can easily score Full Numbers.In social science read all the chapters properly do not leave any topic so you may be choices in examination to attempt problems.More practice on mapwork and figures .Be calm and confident in examination so you can succeed.wish you all the best to achieve your target.Thanks

Hello! One bad examination cannot decide your capability. Hard-work and perseverance can make miracles. Not only two examinations, sometimes its so usual that some of them keep failing all the examinations, but at last in the board exams they grab the ranks. So, Never underestimate yourself with the result of one or two examinations. Until you keep working hard with the desire to get 90+. All The Best! Nikahath
